summary: Summon new heroes to your near using this shout
descriptionHtml:
To use;
write to console "help callhero"
you must be seeing code of mod and write it like that
player.addshout xxxxxxx
then you have to write these commands to console
player.teachword 0002f2cc
player.teachword 0002f2cd
player.teachword 0002f2ce


First word summons hero 1 and he can use these shouts
-Disarm
-Unrelenting Force
-Fire Breath
The hero 1 has 30 seconds duration.

Second word summons hero 2 and he can use these shouts;
-İce Form shout
-Disarm Shout
-Frost Breath shout
-Fire Breath shout
-Cyclone shout
-Dragon Aspect shout
-Unrelenting Force shout
The hero 2 has 60 seconds duration.

Third word summons a phantom dragon and the dragon can use these shouts;
-Disarm shout
-Unrelenting Force shout
-Fire Breath shout
-Frost Breath shout
The dragon has 480 seconds duration.Also you can ride the dragon using bend will shout.

First word has 30 seconds cooldown
Second word has 60 seconds cooldown
Third word has 120 seconds cooldown
author: jokic
